org.jimmutable.core.fields

Interface Field

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FieldArrayList, FieldCollection, FieldConcurrentHashMap, FieldConcurrentHashSet, FieldConcurrentSkipListSet, FieldHashMap, FieldHashSet, FieldList, FieldMap, FieldSet, FieldTreeMap, FieldTreeSet

    public interface Field
    An interface to represent a member of a StandardImmtuableObject that requires custom code to StandardImmutableObject freeze it.

    StandardImmutableObject does not require that it's members implement Field, but it is useful as a declarative interface as a way for a developer to signal adherence to the behaviors defined by Field (i.e. well-behaved freeze().

    Most notably, most Collection or Map implementations in the JDK will have a matching wrapper that also implements Field.

    Author:
    Jim Kane

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void assertNotFrozen()
      Test to see if this object is frozen
      void freeze()
      Make any changes to this object required to make this object immutable.
      boolean isFrozen()
      Returns true if this object is frozen.
